description.lang: The Beanbag gateway is an aesthetically designed component of the system designed to provide an interesting focal point or feature within a property.Its wooden veneer finish illustrates a high quality product!The receiver is mains powered 230V AC 50Hz only, which is connected using a micro USB connector.Communications protocols provided include WiFi and Z Wave.Network standard is IEEE 802.11 b/g/n.Thermostat fail-safe is covered with the provision of a backup temperature sensor.The gateway is designed to be unmounted and free standing to provide installation flexibility within a property.Enclosure protection is to IP30 with an operating temperature range of 0C to 40C.
